feed.title: Hilarious things my kiddos say
feed.subtitle: This is my first jekyll blog and serves two purposes: 1) force myself to keep up with code by using Jekyll to power my blog and 2) capturing hilarious things my kiddos say as they get older.

entry.title: Welcome To Jekyll
entry.content:
Post title

h6 subtitle

Pargraph 1 description. When I first heard about Notion (on a freelance project for Link), I was instantly impressed by the friendly illustrations, intuitive UX and the minimally-executed UI. Though Iâ€™ve only just begun to scratch the surface, I have become engrossed in the product and use it on every new freelance project.

Paragraph 2. So when I received your email about my increased frequency, it got me to thinking: I have a lot of ideas on how to improve or extend Notion and I would love to be a part of the team to help shape them.

Date of post
